original_title: Die optische Industriegesellschaft oder darf's ein viertel Pfund mehr sein?
overview: The film combines documentary scenes, TV clips, and passages from an interview with the then Postmaster General Christian Schwarz-Schilling in a fictional plot and mixes video and 16mm film. A film on videotext and the brave new media world, in which the – presumably first – female hacker redirects a few things into other channels. It is also a critique of the working conditions in the emerging information service industry.
title: Die optische Industriegesellschaft oder darf's ein viertel Pfund mehr sein?
